content.rendered:
Red Rose Classic Rice is the affordable range of everyday rice to make each meal memorable. It is the perfect choice for people who like to include rice in their daily meals.
It can be incorporated into Indian and Asian cuisine, but it can be used in a variety of flavorful recipes. Enriched with nutritional value, it is defined by its aromatic, flavorful & long grains. Whether you are having Khichdi or Fried Rice, Red Rose Classic Rice will turn every meal into comfort food.
Grown & harvested in the foothills of the Himalayas in the Indian subcontinent, this rice is full of essential vitamins & nutrients that will make your meal healthy along with a delectable taste. Organically matured for at least two years for better quantity, fluffiness & yield. The aging process also delivers the unique Basmati aroma & taste to the rice.
All Sona Cereal products are produced following international quality standards, cleaned, sorted & packed in supreme, hygienic & state-of-the-art facilities, without coming in contact with the human touch.

  • Bestseller under the Red Rose Basmati category
  • A perfect blend of length & aroma
  • Perfectly aged rice suitable for everyday cooking
  • XL size grain
  • Fine texture
